靑字的基本解释

靑
qīng
同“青”。

靑字的汉语字典释义

[①]［qīng］
［《廣韻》倉經切，平青，清。］
“寈1”的今字。亦作“棈2”。“靑1”的新字形。
(1)颜色名。㈠绿色，似植物叶子的颜色。宋苏轼《雨》诗：“青秧發廣畝，白水涵孤城。”明何景明《咏怀》：“青蕙緣廣隰，緑蘅被洲中。”参见“青青”。㈡蓝色。参见“青天”。㈢白色。老舍《四世同堂》五一：“慢慢的，窗子发了青。”㈣黑色。《书·禹贡》：“﹝梁州﹞厥土青黎。厥田惟下上。”孔传：“色青黑而沃壤。”孔颖达疏引王肃曰：“青，黑色。”《楚辞·大招》：“青色直眉，美目媔只。”洪兴祖补注：“青色，謂眉也。”宋王观《生查子》词：“兩鬢可憐青，一夜相思老。”明冯梦龙《山歌·比》：“憑你春山弗比得姐箇青，憑你秋波弗比得姐箇明。”
(2)青色物。㈠指青玉或系玉的青丝绳。《诗·齐风·著》：“俟我於庭乎而，充耳以青乎而。”毛传：“青，青玉。”郑玄笺：“青紞之青。”㈡指青雀。参见“青旌”。㈢指靛青。一种从蓝草中提炼的染料。《荀子·劝学》：“青，取之於藍而青於藍。”南朝梁刘勰《文心雕龙·通变》：“夫青生於藍，絳生於蒨，雖逾本色不能復化。”㈣指青雘。一种可涂墙壁的青色矿土。《汉书·司马相

靑字的康熙字典解释

【戌集中】【青字部】　靑； 康熙笔画：8； 页码：页1381第19
〔古文〕????寈【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】?倉經切，音鶄。【說文】東方色也。【釋名】靑，生也。象物之生時色也。【書·禹貢】厥土靑黎。【荀子·勸學篇】靑出之藍而靑於藍。　又神名。【史記·封禪書】秦宣公作密畤于渭南，祭靑帝。　又州名。【書·禹貢】海岱惟靑州。　又鳥名。【禮·曲禮】前有水，則載靑旌。【註】靑，靑雀，水鳥。　又木名。【庾信·步虛詞】空靑爲一林。【註】雲笈七籤，玉淸天中有樹，似松，名曰空靑之林。又【廣韻】男靑、女靑，皆木名。出羅浮山記。　又果名。靑子，橄欖也。【蘇軾詩】紛紛靑子落紅鹽。　又藥名。【本草綱目】空靑，腹中空，破之有漿，治眼疾。一名楊梅靑。【又】白靑，治目疾，色深者爲石靑，淡者爲碧靑。淮南子畢萬術云：白靑，得鐵卽化爲銅。又曾靑、綠靑、扁靑、綠膚靑，?詳【本草綱目】。　又【韻會】竹皮曰靑。【後漢·吳祐傳】殺靑?以寫經書。【註】以火炙?令汗取其靑，易書復不蠹，謂之殺靑。　又【唐·李肇·翰林志】凡大淸宮道觀薦告詞文，用靑藤紙朱字，謂之靑

靑字的起名意思

靑
Basic explanation of words
靑
qīng
Same as "green".
靑
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［qīng］
["Guangyun" Cangjing cut, Pingqing, Qing. ]
The present character of "寈1". Also known as "Ji 2". The new glyph of "靑1".
(1) Color name. (I) Green, like the color of plant leaves. Song Su Shi's "Rain" poem: "Green seedlings spread wide acres, Baishui Han solitary city." Ming He Jingming "Ying Huai": "The green cephalopods are bordered by a wide area, and the green stalks are in the middle of the continent." See "Qingqing". (Ii) Blue. See "blue sky". (Iii) White. Lao She's "Four Generations Under One House" May 1st: "Slowly, the windows turned blue." (iv) Black. "Book·Yugong": "﹝Liangzhou﹞ Jue Tu Qingli. Jue Tian only goes down and up." Kong Chuan: "The color is blue and black, but the soil is fertile." Kong Yingda drew Wang Su and said: "Blue, black." Songs of the Chu: "Cyan straight eyebrows, beautiful eyes only." Hong Xingzu's supplementary note: "Cyan, also called eyebrows." Song Wangguan's "Sheng Chazi" words: "Pitiful green at the temples, and longing for the old all night." Ming Feng Menglong's "Folk Song·Bi": "You can win sister Xiaqing with your Chunshan Fabi, and you can win sister Xiaming with you Qiubo Fabi."
(2) Cyan objects. (1) Refers to sapphire or blue silk rope tied with jade. "Poetry·Qifeng·Work": "As long as I am in the courtyard, I will be full of greenness." Mao Chuan: "Green, green jade." Zheng Xuanjian: "Green 紞之青." ㈡ refers to the green bird. See "Green Jing". (Iii) Refers to indigo. A dye extracted from blue grass. "Xunzi Encouraging Learning": "Blue, taken from blue and blue from blue." Liang Liu Xie of the Southern Dynasties "Wen Xin Diao Long · Tong Bian": "Husband Qing was born in blue, Jiang was born in Qian, although beyond his true nature can not be reproduced化." (iv refers to the Qingyu. A cyan mineral soil that can coat walls. "Han Shu·Sima Xiang
靑
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【戌集】【青字部】　靑; Kangxi Strokes: 8; Page Number: Page 1381 Page 19
〔古文〕???? 寈【Tang Yun】【Jiyun】【Rhyme Meeting”? Cangjing cut, sound 鶄. 【Said the text】Eastern color is also. 【Release Name】Qian, Sheng Ye. When the image is born, the color is also. [Book·Yugong] Jue Tu Li. 【Xunzi·Encourage Learning】to be blue but to blue.　Also the name of God. 【Historical Records·Book of Fengchan】Qin Xuangong made a secret in Weinan to pay homage to Emperor Qian.　Also the name of the state. 【Book·Yugong】Haidai but Qianzhou.　Also known as the bird name. 【Li·Chu Li】If there is water in front of it, it will carry Jingjing. [Note] 靑, 靑靑, waterfowl.　Also wooden name. [Yu Xin·Bu Xunci] Empty 靑 is a forest. [Note] Yunji seven lotteries, there are trees in the Yuchen sky, resembling pine, and the name is empty forest. Also [Guangyun] Male and female talismans, both have wooden names. Out of Luofu Mountain.　Fruit name. Tartare, olives too. [Su Shi's poems] Red salt was dropped in succession.　Also the name of the medicine. 【Compendium of Materia Medica】empty, hollow in the abdomen, broken with pulp, cure eye diseases. A red bayberry. 【Also】Baiqian treats eye diseases. The darker color is Shiqian, and the lighter color is Biqian. Huainanzi Bi Wanshuyun: Bai Tian, get iron and turn into copper. Zeng Zeng, Lvqian, Bianqian, Lvfuqian, detailed [Compendium of Materia Medica].　[Yunhui] The bamboo skin said 靑. [Later Han·Wu You Biography] Killing? To write scriptures. [Note] Use the fire to burn? Let Khan take its scorpion, and the Yi Shu will not be a worm, which is called killing 靑.　[Tang·Li Zhao·Hanlin Chronicles】Fan Daqian Palace Taoist Temple recommended essays, using Chinese characters on Teng Teng Zhi Zhu, which is called 靑
